<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>isSpamContract</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v3/{apiKey}/isSpamContract"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns whether a contract is marked as spam or not by Alchemy.

## Request
